thread.title: Christopher
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Christopher

author: Christopher
title: Christopher
text:
You expect a great service when you buy something however it is the aftercare which really shows the values of a business.
My daughter ordered some shoes but when they arrived they were a little too big. The return form was easy to complete, postage back to Country Attire was covered by them and a refund was received without delay. Brilliant !! Thank you.
